structure.unit: REPEAL OR VACATION OF CHARTERS -- USURPATION

law.catch_line: Order of Legislature needed to repeal or vacate certain charters.
law.text: Actions to repeal or vacate the charters of municipal corporations; banks, railroad, turnpike road and internal improvement companies, shall only be instituted by order of the Legislature, unless otherwise expressly provided.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 482.
